== Javascript Parser Extension for Visual Studio ==

To start using *Javascript Parser Extension* follow steps:
  # Install extension.
  # Click the item in the menu to show toolbox.

===Install steps for VS2008===
  # Unzip pack and copy contents to <%userdocuments%>\Visual Studio 2008\AddIns\
   Example:
   c:\Users\<%Username%>\Documents\Visual Studio 2008\AddIns\
  # Restart Visual Studio.
===Menu location for VS2008===
  Tools\Javascript parser

===Install steps for VS2010===
  # Install `*`.vsix package
  # Restart Visual Studio.
===Menu location for VS2010===
  View\Other Windows\Javascript Parser
